prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a small, leafy creature with a friendly smile.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with vibrant green colors and a sleek, serpentine body.
Show me a starter Pokemon that has a playful nature and loves to explore grassy areas.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a unique leaf-like tail and bright yellow accents on its face.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, with elegant curves and a lively expression.
Give me a visual of a small Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a charming appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a mix of green and cream colors and is known for its agility.
